Title: Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte
Writer: Henry Farrell (screenplay), Lukas Heller (screenplay), Henry Farrell (story)
Actors: Bette Davis, Olivia de Havilland, Joseph Cotten, Agnes Moorehead
Plot: An aging, reclusive Southern belle plagued by a horrifying family secret descends into madness after the arrival of a lost relative.
Awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 2 nominations.
